landing.title: Privacy Policy | Your Business Name
landing.description: Read our privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

intro.heading: Introduction
intro.text: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services or visit our website.

infoCollect.heading: Information We Collect
infoCollect.text: We may collect the following types of information:
infoCollect.item1: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
infoCollect.item3: Health information relevant to providing massage services

howWeUse.heading: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.text: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
howWeUse.item1: To provide and maintain our massage therapy services
howWeUse.item2: To process appointments and manage bookings
howWeUse.item3: To communicate with you about your appointments and our services
howWeUse.item4: To improve our services and customer experience

cookies.heading: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.text: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us remember your preferences and improve site functionality. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

dataProtection.heading: Data Protection and Security
dataProtection.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your information is stored securely and accessed only by authorized personnel who need it to provide our services.

thirdParty.heading: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: We may use third-party service providers to facilitate our services, such as payment processors and booking systems. These providers have access to your personal information only to perform specific tasks on our behalf and are obligated to protect your data.

yourRights.heading: Your Rights
yourRights.text: Under data protection law, you have the right to:
yourRights.item1: Access the personal information we hold about you
yourRights.item2: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
yourRights.item3: Request deletion of your personal information
yourRights.item4: Object to or restrict the processing of your information

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us:

changes.heading: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website with an updated revision date.
